headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Track Record
content: It’s a brave new stunt-filled world out there in GTA Online, and you’re going to need some serious horsepower if you’re going to keep up.  Lucky for you, a wave of powerful new vehicles are here to meet your every need: from the avant-garde stylings of the RE-7B to the utter brutality of Vapid’s Trophy Truck, no matter how unhinged your heart’s desires we’ve got you covered.
